text.name: ACCOUNT.ForgotPasswordMessage
text.value: A password reset link will be sent to your email. If youdon't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.

text.name: ACCOUNT.InvalidEmailAddress
text.value: Can not find this email address in the system.

text.name: ACCOUNT.ThereIsNoTenantDefinedWithName{0}
text.value: There is no tenant defined with name {0}

text.name: ACCOUNT.UserIsNotActiveAndCanNotLogin
text.value: User {0} is not active and can not log in.

text.name: ACCOUNT.EmailIsNotConfirmedAndCanNotLogin
text.value: Your email address is not confirmed. You can not login

text.name: ACCOUNT.WaitingForConfirmEmailLink
text.value: Confirm the link we sent to your email.

text.name: ACCOUNT.TenantNameCanNotBeEmpty
text.value: Tenant name can not be empty

text.name: ACCOUNT.FormIsNotValidMessage
text.value: Form is not valid. Please check and fix errors.

text.name: ACCOUNT.EmailAddressNotFindInSystem
text.value: Can not find this email address in the system.

text.name: ACCOUNT.WaitingForActivationEmail
text.value: Your account is waiting to be activated. Your email address is not confirmed.

text.name: ACCOUNT.WaitingForActivationMessage
text.value: Your account is waiting to be activated by system admin.

text.name: ACCOUNT.YouCanNotResetYourPasswordSendAResetPasswordLinkToYourEmail
text.value: You can not reset your password. You must first send a reset password link to your email.

text.name: ACCOUNT.ResetCodeExpired
text.value: Code invalid password reset has expired. You must send a password reset link again.

text.name: COMMON.MSG.EXCEPTION.ErrorMessageUserDefault
text.value: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

text.name: COMMON.MSG.VALIDATION.InvalidFormat
text.value: The field {0} has an invalid format.

text.value: The field {0} must contain at most {1} characters.

text.name: COMMON.MSG.VALIDATION.MinLength
text.value: The field {0} must contain at least {1} characters.

text.name: COMMON.MSG.VALIDATION.Match
text.value: Field {0} does not match the field {1}.

text.name: YourAccountIsActivated
text.value: Congratulations! Your account is activated. Enter your email address and password to login.

text.name: ThanksRegisterWaitingForActivationEmail
text.value: Thanks for having registered, please confirm the email that we have sent.

text.name: TenantName_Regex_Description
text.value: Tenant name must be at least 2 chars, starts with a letter and continue with letter, number, dash or underscore.

text.name: CanBeEmptyToLoginAsHost
text.value: Can be empty to login as host.

text.name: TenantSelection_Detail
text.value: Please select one of the following tenants.

text.value: You can not reset your password. You must first send a reset password link to your email.

text.value: Reset your password, it will expire in 24 hours!
